channel.title: Homes on Adam Gleave | PhD student @ UC Berkeley
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Adam Gleave | PhD student @ UC Berkeley

item.description: Biography I am an artificial intelligence (AI) PhD student at UC Berkeley, supervised by Stuart Russell. My goal is to develop techniques necessary for advanced automated systems to verifiably act according to human preferences, even in situations unanticipated by their designer. I am particularly interested in improving methods for value learning and preference elicitation, such as inverse reinforcement learning. I work closely with the Center for Human-Compatible AI, a cross-disciplinary research centre.
